scenario_text.value: Ryo! Haru!
Here, we found them! They’re both okay!
Haru...
Oh, what a relief!

Saki, your face is a mess from all those
tears.
I’m so glad we found them, though!

Yes, and now we must make haste! The fog is
starting to spread.

Okay, but doesn’t something about these two
seem off to you?

Things seem...strained. You think they were
fighting?
Ryo... Are you okay?

(Ryo is staring at the ground, not moving,
while Haru regards him coldly.)
(What exactly went on between these two?)

Oh no... Guys, this is not looking good. The
fog is getting real dense!

You’re right, this is bad. Ryo, Haru! You’re
both in danger! Get over here, quick!
Um... What’s that?

(Looking to where Aoi is pointing, I see
a black...shadow?)

Am I seeing things? It looked like some sort
of tentacle came out of that shadow.
No way... It’s heading straight for Ryo?!

Oh man... Oh man, oh man, oh man! That thing
looks like real bad news!
(Ryo’s in trouble! Do we help?!)
It’s risky, but yeah.
Can we even make it?
Of course we’ll help!
Help.
Takuma! Stop!

Ryo’s in trouble! You expect me to just leave
him?!

You’re not going to make it! The fog will get
you, too!
Help.
Takuma! Stop!

Agumon, let go of me! We have to do whatever
it takes to save him!
It’s too late! There’s nothing we can do!
Help.
Takuma! Stop!
Agumon, isn’t there anything we can do?!
No...not a thing. That’s just how it works.
But... No...

That...tentacle...is pulling him into the
shadow...

Ryo! What’s wrong with you?! Get out of
there!
Ryo, you need to run!
Ryo, why? Why won’t you run?
...Hm? I think...he’s saying something.

I...I forgot Mommy was dead... Kept waiting
for a call that was never coming.

There’s... There’s no place for me. Not in
this world, or any other...
Wha...?
Waaaaaaaaah!!!
The fog... It took him.
Huh... Wha...?
That’s... That’s horrible...
No way... I can’t believe this!
No... No...

(Oh, there’s Kunemon. I didn’t see him there
next to Haru.)

(Somehow, in a way that I don’t fully
understand, I can tell that Kunemon is sad.)
Not Kunemon, too...
He’s...disappearing.
(It can’t be... Kunemon’s disappearing...)

Wait... Hold on... Ryo has to still be there,
right?
No...
What? Miyuki?

(Why is she shaking her head like that?
Is she telling me I should give up?)
Takuma...
Haru...

What happened to Ryo was he gave up on
himself...
So this world consumed him.

(Even after the fog lifted, and the shadow
vanished, there was still no sign of Ryo.)

(I’m not really sure what Haru meant by what
he told me.)
(But I do know one thing for certain.)
(Ryo is dead.)

Uh, hey, call me crazy, but...is Ryo running
INTO the fog?
What?!
Ahahahaha! Mommy! Mommy! Heeheehee! Hahaha!

Ryo, uh, doesn’t sound like he’s doing too
well...
Yeah, I thought I heard him laughing...
KEWWW!!!
Wah!
Kunemon?!

Now’s our chance! Come on, everyone! We have
to save Ryo!
You got it!
Man, he is nothing but trouble!
Tch, what a pain...
Wait! What do you guys think you’re doing?!
All right, I got him!
Hold still, Ryo!
Ryo! Are you okay? Hang in there!
...hurts.
Hm? What was that, Ryo?

I said that hurts, you idiots! You didn’t
have to tackle me!

Ryo! You sound like you’re all right now!
Have you come to your senses?

What’s that supposed to mean? I never lost my
senses, genius!

I just...got a little overwhelmed, that’s
all.
Don’t worry about me. I’m fine now.
Hey, the shadow...
Heyyy! Everyone!
Is Ryo all right?!

*huff* *huff* Oh, thank god! The fog’s
cleared up!
Kew!

You’re still here? Don’t think I forgot about
how you bumped into me, you little creep!

But...I guess it did save me, so...thanks.
I’ll let it go this time.
Kew!

Ryo...did you actually thank Kunemon just
now?

Well, yeah. I mean, it did save my life.
I figured it was the least I could do.

Funny, I think maybe you’re forgetting some
people there. You gonna thank us, Ryo?
Hey, shut up! You don’t have to be so smug!
Ahaha!

Hahaha... I finally got to see you again,
Mommy...

And now we’ll always be together... Please
don’t leave me again...
